subject: p15259244
History: Evaluation of the patient with history of kidney and pancreas transplant and currently with sepsis and bacteremia and new oxygen requirement.
Findings: Portable AP chest radiograph was compared to. As compared to the prior study, there is interval minimal increase in vascular congestion. Cardiomediastinal silhouette is stable. There is no change in the appearance of the dialysis catheter. Small bilateral effusions are most likely present. There is no pneumothorax. No new consolidations to suggest infectious process demonstrated.
